original_title: 羞恥！「はい、大陰唇開いて」憧れの医大生に捧げられた私・・・臨床研修の被検体で全裸にさせられる看護学生！
overview: At a nursing school attached to a certain medical  college, it was openly common for medical college students to play with female nursing students naked as clinical specimens under the pretext of joint training .  Riko, who attends the nursing department of this school, spreads her female genitals in front of a male student of the same age and  is scratched inside by the hand of a longing medical college student .  This is just one part of the unknown reality of medical and nursing schools.
title: Shame! “Yes, Open Your Labia” I Was Dedicated To A Long-Awaited Medical College Student ... A Nursing Student Who Can Be Made Naked In Clinical Training Subjects!
